title: Morris loves Jack
brief_description: An off-beat romance between a policewoman and the charming but feckless unemployed actor who shares her house and her money. She is happy to support him emotionally and financially, in spite of his irresponsible attitude to life until she finds him in the arms of “another”. Cast includes Kris McQuade, John Hargreaves, Bill Hunter, David Boyd.
